# Requirements

Downloading the data from [here](gis_data.zip).

```{r}
#| eval: false
download.file(
    url = "https://kamapu.gitlab.io/coachingR/Topics/GIS/gis_data.zip",
    destfile = "gis_data.zip", method = "curl")
unzip("gis_data.zip", overwrite = TRUE)
unlink("gis_data.zip")
```
